attributes.action: Additional allowance for parents whose children are studying at home.
attributes.additional_details:
Parents  needs getting  more financial support from Department  Education, because  children's  are  online  now and parents  do job for teachers. 
Parents  can't  come  back to work, pay more for electricity  because  children's  use laptop.
attributes.background:
Additional allowance for parents whose children are studying at home because school  is closed and parents  can't  work,have expenses because  children's  are at the home (more electricity,gas)
Department  Education  need support  parents!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571483
